hero.headline: Take back control of your digital identity
hero.subhead: A privacy-focused online identity management platform that lets you shop, transact, and interact online without surrendering your personal data to merchants, trackers, or data brokers.
hero.trustNote: Your data stays encrypted on your device. We never see it.

problem.title: The data sharing problem
problem.intro: Currently, online retailers require access to all your personal data. GoldenPassport changes this by selectively sharing only what's necessary.

architecture.title: Real-life transaction flow
architecture.intro: See how GoldenPassport protects your identity throughout a complete purchase journey.

gdpr.title: GDPR alignment
gdpr.intro: GoldenPassport is designed from the ground up to exceed EU GDPR requirements.

cta.title: Join the privacy revolution
cta.intro: We're seeking partners and investors who share our vision for a privacy-respecting internet.

anonymousLogin.title: Anonymous login
anonymousLogin.description: Authenticate without revealing your identity. Use secure tokens instead of emails or passwords.

dataMinimisation.title: Data minimisation
dataMinimisation.description: Share only what's needed, nothing more. Granular consent controls for every transaction.

proxyShield.title: Proxy shield
proxyShield.description: Your real details never reach merchants. We act as a protective intermediary.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-knowledge
zeroKnowledge.description: Even we can't see your data. End-to-end encryption keeps your information private.

store.title: Store securely
store.description: Your identity data is encrypted and stored locally on your device. Only you hold the keys.

share.title: Share selectively
share.description: Choose exactly what to share for each transaction. Reveal only what's necessary, or what is required by law.

transact.title: Transact privately
transact.description: Complete purchases, deliveries, and payments without exposing your real identity.

analytics.title: Anonymized Analytics for Merchants
analytics.description: Merchants receive a suite of anonymized analytics, enabling them to stay in control and deliver hyper-personalization in a privacy-centric manner.

benefits.control: Stay in control with comprehensive anonymized insights
benefits.personalization: Enable hyper-personalization without compromising user privacy
benefits.privacy: Privacy-centric approach that respects user data rights

login.title: Login & Select
login.description: Authenticate with GoldenPassport and browse merchant offerings with your identity protected.

pay.title: Pay
pay.description: Complete payment through our secure proxy. Merchant never sees your real payment details.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: Receive your order at your address without the merchant ever knowing where you live.

architecture.title: Privacy-preserving architecture
architecture.caption: Data flows through GoldenPassport, never directly to third parties. GoldenPassport selectively shares only what's needed:

solutionPoints.paymentDetail: Share only what's required by law per payment type

solutionDetails.payment: No personal details, no purchase history

architecture.note: All connections use TLS 1.3 encryption. Data at rest uses AES-256.

current.title: Current Problem
current.allShared: You must share all three with retailers

merchant.title: Merchant
merchant.data: Product to pack, payment cleared. No name, no purchase history.

payment.title: Payment Provider
payment.data: Payment processed. No personal details, no purchase history.

delivery.title: Delivery Partner
delivery.data: Pickup and dropoff locations only. No name, no payment info.

consumers.label: Consumers
items: Shop online without creating accounts everywhere
Stop receiving targeted ads based on purchase history
Prevent data breaches from exposing your personal information

merchants.label: Merchants
items: Lower risk of costly data breaches

pledges.access: View all your data instantly in the app. No waiting, no forms.
pledges.rectification: Edit your information anytime. Changes propagate immediately.
pledges.erasure: One-tap data deletion. We remove everything, everywhere.
pledges.portability: Export your data in standard formats. Take it anywhere.
pledges.restriction: Pause data sharing with a single toggle. Resume when ready.
pledges.objection: Granular opt-out controls for every processing purpose.

bullets: Zero-knowledge architecture - we can't access your data
Local-first storage - your device, your control
security.note: We're a pre-launch startup. Security certifications will be obtained before public release. Our architecture is designed to exceed industry standards.

investment.title: Seed investment
investment.description: Join us in building the future of online privacy. We're raising our seed round to accelerate development and market entry.
bullets: Strong founding team with fintech and security expertise
Clear path to revenue through B2B2C model
Growing market driven by privacy regulations

partnership.title: Technology partners
partnership.description: We're seeking integration partners across the e-commerce ecosystem to deliver seamless privacy-preserving experiences.

404.title: Page not found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: Server error
500.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again later.

403.title: Access denied
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.
